context: Hello, I heard that you are looking for a movie recommendation. What sort of movies are you into?
I like comedies and movies that have really cool cinemotography I like 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968) Tangerine (2015) And i watched Enter the Void (2009) last night and it was pretty good
I have never seen either of those movies. do you like comedies like The Waterboy (1998) or something like Black Sheep (1996).
Yeah i like The Waterboy (1998) adam sandler is so silly i like absurdist humor
resp: Yes Adam Sandler has made so many great movies, I even like his newer ones like Click (2006) and Grown Ups (2010) .
